document_data.name: Glorious Revolution
document_data.combatant2: The oppressed workers of Duke Bogob
document_data.mainbody: The '''Glorious Revolution''' occurred in the [[1217 DR|Year of the Falling Moon, 1217 DR]]. It was a popular uprising against Duke [[Bogob]].
document_data.History: The conflict began when the oppressed workers in the fields heard the rallying cry: "You have nothing to lose but your [[Chain|chains]]!" The rebellious peasants were killed by the duke's well-equipped knights.
document_data.Equipment: The leaders of the uprising used heavy [[Crossbow|crossbows]] that bore the same name as the event. [[Glorious Revolution (crossbow)|These crossbows]] possessed a ''+2'' [[Item enchantment|enchantment]] that made the [[weapon]] deadlier and guided the wielder's hand toward the target. It was especially effective at hitting [[evil]] targets. Its [[Magic|magics]] also increased the wielder's [[spell]] resistance.
